WorkItem.Description:
Am trying to use Ncal and experimenting with all the possibilities of what excel evaluates. But I found the below issue when I tried to evaluate this formula

If(Or(1=2,2=2),true,false)

Error:
missing ')' at 'or' at line 1:3
mismatched input ',' expecting ')' at line 1:9
missing EOF at ')' at line 1:13


What could be the solution? and let me know if we can evaluate all the type of possible formulas of Excel and do we need to change the format/case.
